messages.subject: OnLine Learning
messages.msgSnippet: Homeschooling parents teach their children in a fun, flexible way that makes children want to learn more.  However, it may sometimes be difficult to decide
messages.messageBody:
Homeschooling parents teach their children in a fun, flexible way
that makes children want to learn more. However, it may sometimes
be difficult to decide what approach or resources to use when
teaching a variety of different subjects to different age groups.
e-Tutor provides lessons that include many aspects and methods of
learning while utilizing integrative learning through the Internet.
Using the World Wide Web is a dynamic way of enhancing the home
classroom. e-Tutor allows students to work at their own pace and
contains knowledge boosters, learning aids, photographs, and
dictionary and vocabulary skill work within a colorful and graphical
format that stimulates learning. The subscription price includes the
nine part lessons, an online library and other resource materials,
homework assistance, instructional coaching, a monthly newsletter,
studying and tutoring aids and supportive assistance in developing
a homeschooling plan. Try the free trial at http://www.e-tutor.com

Marty
